si.title: சில பகுதிகளில் நீர் விநியோகத்தடை
body_lines: සමහර ප්රදේශ හෙට ක්රියාත්මක කරන බව ජාතික ජල සම්පාදන හා ජලාපවහන මණ්ඩලය නිවේදනය කරයි.
ඒ අනුව නිට්ටම්බුව, කන්දහෙහෙනියාව, ගොනගොල්ල, අන්නගොල්ල,
பராமரிப்பு பணிகள் காரணமாக நாளை (11) காலை 10 மணி முதல் இரவு 8 மணி வரை இந்த நீர் விநியோகத் தடை அமுல்படுத்தப்படும். රීල්

en.title: Water supply in some areas
body_lines: The National Water Supply and Drainage Board has announced that some areas will be implemented tomorrow.

Accordingly, Nittambuwa, Kandaheena, Mabakolla, Gonastheniya, Pinnagollawatta, Kovalawatta, Korakkadeniya, Ranabokunagama, Padaliya, Attanagalla, Basyala, Urobola, Tikanda, Mevittikamana, Mahimbula, Mathalala, Kalpitiya The National Water Supply and Drainage Board said.
The water supply ban will be implemented tomorrow (11) from 10 am to 8 pm due to maintenance work. Remble
